mapper.select: select t.id,t.pname,t.parentid,t.grade,t.description,t.start_time,t.end_time,t.timelength,t.orderby,t.is_preview, m.id as m_id,m.media_id,m.media_fileName from xcplus_content.teachplan t left join xcplus_content.teachplan_media m on t.id=m.teachplan_id where t.course_id=#{id} and t.status =1
